title: BRIEF-WSP Acquires Lievense, A Netherlands-Based Multidisciplinary Consulting Firm
text:
BRIEF-WSP Acquires Lievense, A Netherlands-Based Multidisciplinary Consulting Firm

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 11, 2019 08:10)

BRIEF-WSP Acquires Lievense, A Netherlands-Based Multidisciplinary Consulting Firm Oct 11 (Reuters) - WSP Global Inc : * WSP ACQUIRES LIEVENSE, A NETHERLANDS-BASED MULTIDISCIPLINARY CONSULTING FIRM * WSP GLOBAL INC - ACQUISITION WAS FINANCED USING WSP'S AVAILABLE CASH AND CREDIT FACILITIES

BRIEF-WSP Acquires Lievense, A Netherlands-Based Multidisciplinary Consulting Firm
description: BRIEF-WSP Acquires Lievense, A Netherlands-Based Multidisciplinary Consulting Firm
